meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of voodoo.
meanings.sent1: The voodooistic rituals were filled with mysterious chants and dances.
meanings.sent2: The necklace she wore had a voodooistic symbol hanging from it.
meanings.sent3: The voodooistic doll on the shelf seemed to be watching over the room.
meanings.sent4: Her voodooistic powers seemed to influence the outcome of the game.
meanings.sent5: The eerie atmosphere in the room felt voodooistic, sending shivers down her spine.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to voodoo practices or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The voodooistic ceremony included offerings to the spirits.
meanings.sent2: She was fascinated by the voodooistic traditions of the island.
meanings.sent3: The voodooistic potion brewed by the witch had an unexpected effect.
meanings.sent4: His voodooistic charms seemed to bring him luck in all his endeavors.
meanings.sent5: The voodooistic symbols painted on the walls added an air of mystery to the room.
